                   throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                          IOException
        Get the MD5 hash of the given file.
        Parameters:
        file - file to compute a hash on
        Returns:
        a byte array of the MD5 hash
        Throws:
        IOException - if file cannot be found
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - if MD5 is not available
